评论概述: Here's a review based on your experience with the boho shirt:
评论详情: Fashion Review: Boho Shirt with a Creative Twist  I recently got my hands on a gorgeous boho shirt that has quickly become a favorite in my wardrobe! The fabric is wonderfully flowing, making it super comfortable to wear. What really stands out are the vibrant colors—they pop beautifully and add a cheerful touch to any outfit.  To take it a step further, I decided to turn this shirt into a fun DIY dyeing project and made a stylish slit in it. This added a personal flair and made the crafting experience even more enjoyable.  If you're looking for a versatile piece that combines style and comfort, this boho shirt is a fantastic choice. Whether you wear it as is or customize it like I did, it's sure to be a standout piece that you’ll love to show!!
Although this skirt is very long, it’s super cute and flattering. I love that it has pockets and very deep pockets too! It’s high quality and can be washed easily

The green is darker in person than in the pictures. Not a deal breaker for me, but be ready for that. Thankfully, the top I had planned for it still matched okay. I'm 5 feet tall, 145, the length was good, not too long. I just pulled it up like a high waisted skirt until it wasn't dragging. It looked good with my shirt tucked in. I got lots of compliments on it. Overall, good for the price. I may buy in other colors.

评论概述: Pretty but very long and doesn't breathe
评论详情: The pattern and colors are very attractive, but the skirt is long enough that it requires at least low heels, and I'm fairly tall. As is usually the case with brands like this, the product picture is also deceptive, showing a full, flowing skirt when the actual item is much skimpier, more just a slight A line. But my main complaint is the fabric. There are some polyesters that are soft and comfortable, even airy. The fabric of this skirt felt oddly stiff, like some kind of slightly scratchy plastic. It didn't breathe, meaning that on a very warm evening, it makes you even warmer. Too bad, since I got it for summer use (beach cover up) with sandals. It might be okay for fall/winter wear, though, with something between it and skin, like with boots, leggings and a sweater.
Like it, but sad the color is not the same as the picture. It a lighter turquoise green.
Simple & perfect for summer. NOT transparent which is rare to find with white skirts

I get so many compliments when I wear this skirt! There is no lining however not sheer enough to tok underwear. The flow is so fun. The elastic waist is a nice touch. It's versatile enough to wear as a skirt for a day out or as a cover up for a suit. It washes just fine on cold. The length is a bit long on me, I'm 5'3 so I just roll the waist over once and it fixes this issue for me. If I were shorter I don't think this would work, just FYI. Over all love this skirt and would recommend!
Material is light weight soft no flowy. So versatile with casual or dress up look. Washes well .has pockets and drawstring
It's thin and great for the summer. Love the length. It fit great
So thin but not breathable at all. The quality of the material is not great and pretty scratchy. It is also single lined
Love it.  Finally, a skirt that is actually long enough.  I'm 5'8" and it is just right.  Like the pattern and material.
Love everything about this skirt!! Fits me perfectly🥰 The pockets are an added bonus for sure. Not transparent at all and has great flow and the material is good quality.

I bought this twice. Once for my teenage granddaughter who loved it but thought it was supposed to have pockets. I gave another as a gift to a friend who loves everything "hippy". The material was as nice or soft as I had imagined, but both gifts were liked.

So good I had to order a second one. I’ll probably order a third! Very pretty, but not girly. Flows nicely, but does not waved around. Easily dressed up or down. Flat in color not shiny. Has a slip that goes partway down, approximately to the knees, so not see-through. Super comfortable. waistband is not too tight. So perfect for travel because I can squish them into a suitcase and they come out looking great!!!!!! I am 5’7”, 133 pounds. I’m sure I purchased a medium because I am a medium and pretty much everything. The skirts fall to my ankle, just barely above the lump on the outside of your foot. So I am attentive to walking so I don’t trip. So far quality is great. The fabric is thin so a little delicate but I haven’t had any tears yet.
Cute skirt. Good material.  A little on the long side but I'm only 5'4. I would go up a size because it runs small. I'm 133 lbs and wear a medium.  I would go up a size for a better fit.
I love the Boho skirts.  They fit to size.

This skirt is too sheer to wear without a slip.  It is also incredibly long.  I am 5’4 and have to roll the top twice and pull the skirt to my armpits to wear it without tripping on it.
Cute skirt but it does not have a liner like the other one I ordered so it’s thin and it isn’t this pretty of a green color like the picture shows. It’s more like a grayish green.
The color is actually Gray with an imaginary green hint to it.  I do love it but I expected green.

I was so excited for this skirt... and I think perhaps because I had such high hopes, I was set up for disappointment.  Now I will say, the skirt itself is very pretty. It is a good length, vibrant in color, and has actual, decently-sized pockets. It flows well enough (though it isn't winning any medals in that department). From a distance, it seems nice. Not amazing. But nice. And that's where my compliments end.  My biggest problem, honestly, is the fabric. It is 100% polyester, but it feels plasticky. Like, it's not exactly the material windbreakers are typically made of, but it's close enough that it was the first comparison I thought of when touching the skirt. It's not super breathable, and it does not feel great on bare skin. This latter point is especially important because the skirt has *no lining at all.* Now, that isn't as big of an issue in terms of the fabric being translucent, because the weird fabric is so thick that it saves the skirt from being totslly see-through, but it is definitely a downside in that the uncomfortable polyester thus has to rest directly against your legs.  Overall, it just feels... cheap. I'll probably keep it and wear it because of the cute pattern and pockets, and because I'm so very lazy when it comes to returning things, but if I could stop my past self from having spent money on it, I absolutely would have.
I have an apron belly and definitely need to size up! Tight on top area. The color is cute though. Material is thin
The color I received was not what I ordered, but that being said, the fit and fabric are great, and it flowed as it should.
This maxi skirt was perfect For a senior photos, it was as pictured! I would say that it runs one size down.

I returned for multiple reasons. First, I’m 5’4, 160 pounds currently. I bought a medium, tried it on and it’s way too long. Second reason, I’m returning is because of the material, polyester is the most disgusting fabric. Look for Rayon fabric if you want cheap skirts but don’t want that stinky polyester sweat smell.

This skirt is light weight , high rise, and doesn't wrinkle very easily. The only negative thing I would say would be I’m 5’3 and it’s way too long for me I have to wear heals or I would be tripping over the bottom of it
